verses.name: Matthew 12:12
verses.text: How much then is a man better than a sheep? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days.

verses.name: Matthew 12:13
verses.text: Then saith he to the man, Stretch forth thine hand. And he stretched it forth; and it was restored whole, like as the other.

verses.name: Matthew 12:14
verses.text: Then the Pharisees went out, and held a council against him, how they might destroy him.

verses.name: Matthew 12:15
verses.text: But when Jesus knew it, he withdrew himself from thence: and great multitudes followed him, and he healed them all;

verses.name: Matthew 12:16
verses.text: And charged them that they should not make him known:
